i1.name: Triumphant Roar
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Alistar''' gains a [[stack]] of ''Triumph'' for every enemy {{tip|champion}} he {{tip|stun|stuns}} or {{tip|airborne|displaces}} with {{ai|Pulverize|Alistar}}, {{ai|Headbutt|Alistar}}, or {{ai|Trample|Alistar}}, and every time an enemy {{tip|minion}} or non-epic {{tip|monster}} dies nearby.

At 7 ''Triumph'' stacks, '''Alistar''' consumes them and roars, {{tip|healing}} himself for {{passive progression/deprecated version|25 to 161}} and all nearby allied champions for {{ft|double the amount.|{{passive progression/deprecated version|25*2 to 161*2}}.}}
'''Alistar''' roars instantly if a nearby enemy champion or epic monster dies. Once ''Triumph'' stacks are consumed '''Alistar''' cannot roar again for a short duration, but can still gain stacks.
i1.notes:
* Healing occurs simultaneously for '''Alistar''' and his allies.
** There is a VFX projectile (700 missile speed) that cannot be destroyed by {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} and is unrelated to the actual heal.
* '''Alistar''' loses all ''Triumph'' stacks upon dying.

q1.name: Pulverize
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Alistar''' slams the ground beneath him, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to all nearby enemies and {{tip|stun|stunning}} and {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} simultaneously for 1 second.
q1.notes:
* ''Pulverize'' can be activated during {{ai|Headbutt|Alistar}} to immediately cast on arrival.
* Casting {{si|Flash}} during the cast time will affect enemies at the new location.

w1.name: Headbutt
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Alistar''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target enemy's location. If the target is still within a certain radius when the dash ends uninterrupted, he deals them {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|airborne|knocks them back}} in relation to his original location over {{fd|0.75 seconds}} whilst also {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for 1 second.
''The ability can be dodged if the target moves 400 units away.''
w1.notes:
* The dash is speed depends on the inverse of the distance to the target:
** If '''Alistar's''' [[size|radius]] overlaps with his target's, he will dash with {{as|1200 speed|movement speed}}.
** If '''Alistar''' is further from his target than the previous condition, he will dash with (1200 * dash distance) / (dash distance - sum of radiuses).
*** At maximum target range, against an enemy with a 65 radius (median of all champions), '''Alistar''' will dash with {{as|1544 speed|movement speed}} (reaching his target within {{tt|{{fd|0.429}} seconds|rounded to next game tick}}).
*** Both the lower the dash distance and the larger '''Alistar''' and/or his target, the faster the dash becomes; This scales hyperbolically.
* When ''Pulverize'' is buffered during the dash, the knockback distance is reduced to 200 units.
* The CC duration of the ability can be reduced by up-to 25% {{stil|Tenacity}}, due to airborne not being reducible while the stun is.
* ''Headbutt'' can knock enemies through terrain. The {{tip|airborne|knockback}} stops short on walls that cannot be surpassed but the disable duration is not changed.
* The [[spell indicator]] for this ability also displays the direction for the knock back relative to '''Alistar's''' position.
* Casting {{si|Flash}} during the {{tip|dash}} will interrupt ''Headbutt''.

e1.name: Trample
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Alistar''' becomes {{tip|ghosted}} and tramples the ground around him every {{fd|0.5}} seconds for 5 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies and gaining a ''Trample'' stack every time the ability damages at least one enemy champion.

At 5 ''Trample'' stacks, '''Alistar''' next {{tip|basic attack}} within 6 seconds deals {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|35 to 290}} '''bonus''' magic damage}} and applies a 1-second {{tip|stun}} on-hit to its target.
e1.notes:
* The {{tip|stun}} and '''bonus''' damage are blocked by {{tip|spell shield|spell shields}} but the base attack damage is not.
* The attack bonus is consumed if the attack {{tip|blocked}}, but not if it is {{tip|dodged}} or missed while '''Alistar''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}. In all cases, the attack's effects are negated as normal.
* As it is an [[on-hit]] effect, the bonus damage and stun can be applied by {{iis|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} Phantom Hit.

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Magic Damage Per Tick|{{ap|8 to 20}} {{as|(+ 4% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|80 to 200}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}
effects.str:
• Magic Damage Per Tick: (+ 4% AP)
  • Total Magic Damage: (+ 40% AP)

r1.name: Unbreakable Will
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Alistar''' {{tip|cleanse|cleanses}} himself of all {{tip|crowd control}}. For the next 7 seconds, '''Alistar''' [[damage modifier|reduces]] incoming damage received.
r1.notes:
* {{tip|True damage}} cannot be reduced by any means and will deal full damage to '''Alistar''' during ''Unbreakable Will''.
* ''Unbreakable Will's'' modifier to incoming damage stacks additively with {{cai|Hemoplague|Vladimir}} for a total reduction of 45/55/65%.{{tt|*|this might be unintended}}
